title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

OB: Unable to select any item on the first attempt.

EB: The item can be selected successfully on the second attempt.

SR: 
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.
3. Verify that the item cannot be selected on the first attempt. 
4. Repeat step 2 and verify that the item can be selected successfully on the second attempt.
